GameItemType.DisplayName: The Richness Of A State by Smitham Ad
GameItemType.Description: No one actually reads it, they just cherrypick passages to seemingly support their nonsensical arguments. If you actually bother to read it yourself, you shall grow wiser in the matters of wealth.
